title: Sticky roast chicken - rotisserie style
ingredients: ['4 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '2 onions, quartered', '2 (1.8kg) whole chickens']
